policyAffectedProposalsText: The proposed changes in {{title}} will affect the other proposals. Further updates might get rewritten if the current proposal won't get resolved before.
confirmUnsubscribe: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from

bountiesPage.successClaimBountyNotification: The blockchain transactions might take some time to perform, please visit the page in few seconds

notifications.transactionDelay: The blockchain transactions might take some time to perform, please visit DAO details page in few seconds.
notifications.noArchivedNotifications: There are no archived notifications yet

appFooter.opensourceAsIs: SputnikDAO 2021. The software is an open source and provided “as is”, without warranty of any kind.
appFooter.communityDeveloped: Community developed. Not audited. Use at your own risk.

comments.commentsSpamProtection: Due to spam protection no more than 5 messages per minute are allowed.

createDAO.createNewDAOWay: A DAO is a new way for people to organize and work together
createDAO.daoIncorrectLengthError: Incorrect DAO name - at least 3 characters expected.
createDAO.daoIncorrectCharactersError: Incorrect DAO name - you can use letters and numbers only with hyphens and spaces in the middle.

daoNameForm.daoFieldsDescription: All fields bellow, unless otherwise noted are required.
daoNameForm.daoSampleText: Sample text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient.

daoLegalStatus.daoKYCDescription: Please explain your DAO`s Legal Status and Jurisdiction (if known).
daoLegalStatus.daoKYCLink: Please attach a link to the relevant document as proof of legal status.

daoLinksForm.daoLinksDescription: Looking to grow the DAO members? Add links to allow people to learn more about your DAO.

daoRulesForm.daoSetRulesDescription: All fields bellow, unless otherwise noted are required.

daoRulesTemplate.daoRulesTemplateClubDescription:
A small circle of friends
A group of fans
A social club
daoRulesTemplate.daoRulesTemplateFoundationDescription:
A group giving donations
An organization funding community projects
A fund for open-source projects
daoRulesTemplate.daoRulesTemplateCorporationDescription:
A business with shareholders
A startup or company
daoRulesTemplate.daoRulesTemplateCooperativeDescription:
A business with members
A creative collective

daoRules.daoRulesFlatDescription: No groups; all members have equal access.
daoRules.daoRulesGroupsDescription: Specific groups can vote on specific proposals.

daoRulesSections.daoRulesProposalsDescription: Who can submit proposals to your DAO? (submit is vote)
daoRulesSections.daoRulesVotingDescription: Carefully pick to not let people who own the token but not part of the DAO overtake you!
daoRulesSections.daoRulesStructureDescription: Select level of access to vote on proposals.

daoFlagForm.daoFlagCreateDescription: Both fields are optional. If you skip, default image will be used instead. An image and a logo together form a flag of your DAO!
daoFlagForm.daoFlagCoverUploadDescription: Cover will be used as a branded letterhead of your proposals, also small icon of your flag won’t include logo on it.
daoFlagForm.daoFlagLogoUploadDescription: Logo will be placed on top of your flag and will be visible on your full view DAO details.

daoPreviewForm.daoPreviewHeader: Preview of your custom DAO assets

daoPreviewFutureForm.daoMakeSureDescription: Make sure everything right and clear, this is how users will see your DAO on the platform!

daoSubmitForm.daoSubmitError: There are errors in your form. Please, check validation messages on the page.
daoSubmitForm.daoSubmitLiability: Creating a DAO is a liability

myDAOsPage.noDAOs: You have no DAOs, but you can
